body.name: Tower Surge Protector Power Strip with 12 Outlets 4 USB (1 USB C), 6.5Feet Extension Cord with Multiple Outlets, Charging Station, Power Strip Tower, Office Desk Supplies, Dorm Essentials
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: 【16 IN 1 Tower Power Strip with USB-C】- This surge protector power strip with 12 AC outlets and 4 smart USB (1 USB C) charging ports(Total 5V/3.4A) can power up to 16 electronic devices simultaneously. Integrated circuit breaker and 1200 Joules protection rating ensure the safety of your electronics.

【Surge Protection & Overload Protection】- The surge protector tower with overload protection protects against spikes and fluctuations. The reset/off switch with integrated circuit breaker for overload protection of all outlets. This power strip has overload protection, short-circuit protection, over current protection, over-voltage protection and overheating protection. It will automatically cut power to protect connected devices when voltage surge is overwhelming.

【USB- C Fast & Smart Charge】- 4 USB ports total 3.4A, each USB A port features 2.4A Max output. USB C charging port features 3A Max. Built-in with smart technology, detecting charging devices and deliver optimal charging speed automatically, compatible with most USB devices.

【Flat Plug Extension Cord with Multiple Outlets 】- The Low-profile flat plug fits easily in tight spaces, 45° right angle plug design prevents other plugs blocking. The 6.5FT upgraded extension cord is made of pure copper, which is very thick and has better current carrying capacity . Environmental protection and fire-resistance PC shell with flame retardant at 1382℉ makes it more durable and longer lifetime.

【Wide Space & Space Saving】- With the vertical tower design, this surge protector takes a little space while powering even though 16 devices at same time. The steady base with anti-slip mat on the bottom effectively avoid wobbling and slipping around. 12 AC outlets with long space in between, it easier to use for all kinds of equipment and without blocking each other.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Next page 1 Multi Plug Tower 2 Office Desk Accessories 3 Compact for Many Places 4 TV Power Strip

16 IN 1 Charging Tower Simple Operation: There is an independent control switch surge protector with indicator light.4 Smart USB Charging: Tower Power Strip has 4 USB ports(Max output 3.4A/17W in total) with smart IC charging technology, will automatically identify output optimal charging speed for your devices.No longer worry about the outlet is not enough.

Lighting Protection With 1200 joules surge protection, you never have to worry about things like power spikes or storms damaging your valuable devices. The surge protector uses oversize metal oxide varistors that absorb electricity and release it as heat.

USB- C Fast & Smart Charging 4 USB ports total 3.4A, each USB A port features 2.4A Max output. USB C charging port features 3A Max. Two-in-one Design It contain Main swith and overload protection in this switch. At the RESET side, USB-A & USB-C & AC Outlets are at work 4 Sides Design The four-sided design not only increases the number of plugs and saves space, but also increases aesthetics and stability. Anti-slip Mat The power strip tower thicked and broadened base with anti-slip mat on the bottom, maximally preventing wobbling and sliding around.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This mini tower was just what the doctor ordered. It's compact, not obtrusive. It comes with a sturdy cord.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product, great value
reviews.reviewText: I bought 2 of these. One in black for teens room and one in white for the front room. The one in the front room is absolutely perfect, does NOT get hot or seem overloaded. They usb and C ports charge VERY VERY well. The one in the other room is the same, no over heating or other issues, we just needed MORE usb ports on that one, but that's a personal issue, as I knew how many ports it had when I ordered it. I will be buying at least one more for my Christmas decorations. I bought them to replace 2 of another brand that were burned up when a tree fell on our power lines and sent a huge surge. So I do not yet know how well they will hold under those circstancestances but I hope to never need ro find out! But with the normal fuse box surge turning power off and back on and one big electrical storm with serious lightening activity and power flashes , they haven't had a problem! I highly recommend these!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Compact and easy to dust.
reviews.reviewText: I love this thing, it's not only adorable, but it makes for keeping my power strip easily accessible for easy dusting. I keep it on my desk, whereas my old power strip stayed on the floor and I can't bend over too well due to back issues.I love that it has USB charging ports as well, my phone charges pretty fast using it. It's also a cleaner look than the long strips, as well as taking up much less space.Another thing that I love, is that the plug is flush flat to the wall rather than sticking outward. The outlet I need to put it in is up against the head of my bed, so I was always so worried about my old power strip being dislodged from the outlet. Now I don't have that worry.The plug is also at an angle, so if you put it in the top most plug in an outlet, you can still use the bottom plug for other things.A good find, I'll be buying a few more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars If you are looking for a tower plug for all of your stuff, this is a really good one.
reviews.reviewText: I have looked at several of these tower plugs and settled on this one. Good choice as this is a really good item. I have it in my computer room and was able to plug everything in the system into it as well as my TV and ROKU. Accommodates the plugs that are a small box as well. Worth the money!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great surge protector
reviews.reviewText: Love this outlet tower! It has more plugs than the flat protector and takes up far less space. It is also less noticeable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars good quality and value, plug is sideway.
reviews.reviewText: works much better than the strip, lots of outlet. lot more organize. It also comes with three usb port, and is a surge protector, good build quality and price, one small gripe, the outlet is position sideway, so only could use two outlet instead of all three if the plug is wider.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love, that it is so easy to use, along with no headaches! Great product, ease of use, making life easier!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Power strip plug
reviews.reviewText: I love this power plug. It doesn't require much space, and I can charge my phone, tablet, my daughter's watch in no time at all. Definitely plan on buying a couple more.
We travel a lot and take it with us .. we also have two at home. It’s perfect in the suitcase.. A GREAT BUY..!!..
This is the best extension type cord you could possibly own. Price was right. And the USB ports are an extra bonus.Would highly recommend this.

reviews.reviewTitle: Interesting little power bar. (Uh oh, there is an update at the end)
reviews.reviewText: I was thinking this would be great for the corner of my bathroom where I have a heated towel rack on a timer and an electric toilet seat with bidet like features and I have a dehumidifier and I wanted to put in an Alexa device like the Echo Pop. All too much for the one outlet I have there so I thought this unit would be great and not take up much room. The problem was the way the cords plug in to this little bar. It honestly didn't take up less room than a small straight bar because the cords stick out when they are plugged in. That coupled with the timer, it was hard to stop this unit from having the floating effect because of the way the cords were plugged into it. So thinking I would save space didn't pan out the way I had hoped, but at least I was able to plug everything in with spares left over and everything works when they are all on together at the same time. So no tripping the bar which is a good thing. But I do like that I can now plug all my plugs into the device and still have room for more. Doubt I would need anything more in this spot but in case I do I have the room. I just have it sit in behind the machine and were good to go. I have yet to try charging my phone with this power bar yet because I don't sit there long enough. LoL For that reason I am in.This is an update which kind of affects my situation. Took away a star because there was no warning in the description about not using this in the bathroom which is where I use mine. So I am going to leave it in the bathroom and hope that the circuit breaker is working in case of a short due to moisture. It is unlikely because I use an exhaust fan and a dehumidifier in that bathroom, so moisture build up is unlikely and it is not near the tub or sink. But had it said specifically in the description not to use in the bathroom, I would probably looked for something else. And my outlet is ground faulted so I should have nothing to worry about.
They sent a replacement unit as fast as they can after the original unit encounter a problem. The replacement unit is working perfectly. Keep up the great customer support. Thanks!
